questions.question: In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a Warlord of the Sea who rules over a kingdom in the sky. What is...?
This story arc is named after its geographical formation and features the first appearance of Admiral Aokiji. What is...?
questions.answer: The Long Ring Long Land Arc

questions.question: This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
This technique, used by Franky, involves a powerful blast from his mechanical body. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This character, often seen with a pinwheel hat, is the adoptive older brother of a Straw Hat crew member and was once a member of the Sun Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
